section.p: The installation of comprises the following steps:

li.p: Preparing the integration of with your OpenStack platform.

Installing the Monitoring Service. It is recommended that you use a dedicated physical machine for the Monitoring Service which meets the requirements outlined in the next section. It is not recommended that there are any other services running on the machine.

note.p: For in productive operation, do not install the Monitoring Service on a virtual machine. has demanding hardware requirements that are not met by a virtual machine. In addition, neighboring virtual machines may cause trouble.

li.p: Installing a Metrics Agent. A Metrics Agent is installed as an extension to your OpenStack platform for monitoring an OpenStack service and the server on which it is deployed.
Installing a Log Agent. A Log Agent is installed as an extension to your OpenStack platform for managing the logs of an OpenStack service and the server on which it is deployed.
Installing the Horizon Plugin. The Horizon Plugin is installed as an extension to your OpenStack plaform . It is required for accessing the monitoring functions from the OpenStack Horizon dashboard.
